Trivia The soundtrack of this episode uses excerpts from Threnody for the Victims of Hiroshima, by Krzysztof Penderecki.

mean, he's dying anyway.
Well, he is.
mean, it's not like it's going to save him.
He's got, what, days?
Bella: Well, if it's what's in there makes those days easier, that'll do for me.
think this episode captures that idea better than any other in this season in serious way.
The 'Thing' they're running from is designed to look like the technology we have TODAY, with just little tweaking.
Not to spoil anything, just enjoy some well crafted, doom and gloom idea of our future.
